sentence.text: To evaluate the role of constitutive epigenetic changes in normal body cells of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination/mitotic cytokinesis-mutation negative patients, we have developed a deep bisulfite sequencing assay targeting the promoter regions of 8 tumor suppressor (TS) genes (BRCA1, BRCA2, DNA repair, protein phosphorylation, negative regulation of protein phosphorylation, TP53, mismatch repair, RB1) and the estrogene receptor gene (transcription by RNA polymerase II), which plays a role in tumor progression.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
